org.apache.pig.validator

Interface PigCommandFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackAndWhitelistFilter

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface PigCommandFilter
    Interface defining Pig commands and a validate(Command) method to operate on it
